0.1.name: wordpress/urdu-formatter-shamil
0.1.description:
This Plugin automatically detects Urdu posts, comments and posts summery (Excerpt), and If Urdu is found then it sets the proper direction, size and font of text according to Urdu.

With this plugin you can carry blogging in both languages (Urdu and English). Find more detail in Settings page or visit plugin site. If you have any other question, please contact with plugin developer M Bilal M.
